fields.title: Simple Notification
fields.message: This is simple notification. It has no duration set so it will show up till its gone.

fields.title: Timed Notification
fields.message: This notification has a duration. It will only show up between the specified dates.

fields.title: Expired Notification
fields.message: This notification has a duration but its long passed so... you shouldnt see it :D

fields.title: This is a Persistent message
fields.message: This is a persistent message. It appears every where and cannot be closed or asked not to appear anymore. You can set duration times.
